channel.title: Help fixing arrows for range
channel.description: hello, i need help fixing my arrwos for ranging for rsps. the first problem is that i have rune and adamant arrows coded onto my rsps shops but they dont look like bolts they look like the old old fake bolts if you know what i mean. How do i amke htemm look like the bolts in runescape? Can someone show me how i can add dragon arrows onto my server because i have a dark bow but no arrows to use on it.

item.title: Help fixing arrows for range
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

underdrive:

hello, i need help fixing my arrwos for ranging for rsps. the first problem is that i have rune and adamant arrows coded onto my rsps shops but they dont look like bolts they look like the old old fake bolts if you know what i mean. How do i amke htemm look like the bolts in runescape? Can someone show me how i can add dragon arrows onto my server because i have a dark bow but no arrows to use on it.

you need to assign the gfx to the item id ur ranging with

Read full topic
